Reviews.Title: Altronix RBSNTTL Relay review
Reviews.Author: JimmyG
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent relay to use in an alarm system to switch power on and off to an external siren.  I use this device with a Altronix power supply and a GE Simon alarm system.  Shipping was fast and it was easy to track the status of my shipment.

Reviews.Title: Worked just like it is supposed to.
Reviews.Author: fd1
Reviews.Content: Used to add a louder siren on alarm system.  Wiring was not real logical to me, but there is good info online and had no problems and it works great.  I dropped the rating to 4 stars because the board is mounted with included double sided foam tape.  It worked fine, but I wonder if it will eventually let go after time and repeated temperature cycles.  Would have preferred a traditional screw/standoff mounting.
